pages.text: > $(n)Behavior:$() Passive$(br)> $(n)Spawn:$() Brown Ant Nests.$(br)> $(n)Properties:$() $(br)Teleport to $(6)Utopia Kingdom$().$(br)> $(n)Drops:$() They don’t drop anything. You are evil for killing one of them.

pages.title: Description
pages.text: The Brown Ant is a small creature that spreads peace whenever he walks. Due to the peace of the creature, Brown Ants contain the energy to transport whoever interacts with them to a Utopia. Otherwise, if you don’t interact with them, you could always just watch them crawl. They’re neat creatures anyways.
